p: S. kitaibelii EO constituents from this study and from literature reports [ 18, 36, 37, 38, 39, 40] are shown in Table 3. The classification between them according to the content of chemical compounds was performed using HCA analysis ( Figure 1a). This analysis showed that differences in EO composition could be separated into several potential clusters (chemotypes): geraniol, p-cymene and limonene, with high abundance of linalool and borneol, which is in accordance with a previous study [ 18].
